The meta voice command picked up the external sound ( from the different device ) as part of the message being sent. The user / PT had to reduce the volume on the external device to prevent that from happening.
The user / PT mentioned that with doing the alternative , they were unable to focus on the video.
User / PT mentioned that they liked how the meta ai emphasizes and puts feelings into what is being described or read in response to a question.
By observation , I could tell the user / PT really enjoys the meta ai scavenger hunt task.
The user/ PT mentioned the color discrimination ( for the Lego task ) was better inside compared to being outside .

The user / PT mentioned that while doing the Lego task (outdoors) the previous day, they were not aware they could select the photos in WhatsApp making it appear larger and that must have been why they struggled to see the images and mentioned that it was difficult to see which we initially interpreted as not being clear enough. Today , for same Lego task (indoors) the user / PT did not have that issue. They were able to see much clearer , and seemed more relaxed and comfortable following the instructions to put the pieces together.
The user / PT took off the glasses for a second to rub their eyes.
